review_details: Best part of our holiday! We enjoyed an entire day of sea, sun and fishing. Especially the fantastic meal (we ate the catch of the day) that was cooked by the captain himself!

reviewTitle: the best boat trip of the island
review_details: It is a great way to experience the ionian sea!! A day filled with amazing views, swimming, beaches you can only reach by boat and a catch of the day cooked meal by on board chef Sisi.
